title.rendered: 2022 Bejing Winter Games Travel Package Rates

content.rendered:
2022 Winter Games Rates

The rates below are based on a travel package including 6 nights in your choice of first class accommodations (Feb 3-9, 9-15 or 15-21), round-trip airport transfers, personalized meet-and-greet upon arrival in Beijing, daily breakfast, your preferred event day experiences, 24/7 onsite host services and more. However, you can completely customize your package to make it perfect for you.
Hotel PackageRoom TypePackages From
Four Seasons BeijingDeluxe Room  $7,925
Four Seasons BeijingAmbassador Suite $9,535
Contact our sports travel specialists for your custom trip quote.
*Rates are per person in USD based on double occupancy. Single occupancy rates are available. Triple and Quad occupancy may be available. A 50% deposit is required to secure your package. Final balance will be due November 1, 2021. Availability and pricing subject to change prior to booking. Opening week packages are subject to additional charges.
